full_description:
ASRock A520M-HVS AMD AM4 Micro ATX Motherboard

The ASRock A520M-HVS AMD AM4 Micro ATX Motherboard is a versatile and feature-rich option for computing needs. It supports AMD AM4 Socket Ryzen processors, offering a 6 Phase Power Design for reliable performance. With support for DDR4 4733+ (OC) RAM, it ensures fast and efficient multitasking. The motherboard features multiple connectivity options, including PCIe 3.0 x16 and PCIe 3.0 x1 slots, D-Sub and HDMI graphics output options, and various USB ports. It also includes Realtek Gigabit LAN for reliable networking. The Ultra M.2 interface enables high-speed data transfer, and the motherboard supports AMD Smart Access Memory for enhanced GPU performance. With its premium power chokes, high-density glass fabric PCB, and full spike protection, the motherboard ensures stability and durability.

ASRock B450M-HDV R4.0 AMD Motherboard

ASRock A320M-HDV R4.0 AMD Motherboard built in AMD AM4 Socket with AMD Promontory B450 chipset.This Motherboard supports SATA3 6Gb/s M.2 modules, and is compatible with  ASRockâ€™s U.2 Kit for installing some of the worldâ€™s fastest U.2 PCIe Gen3 x4 SSDs.

The main component of the Motherboard

This Motherboard Supports CPU  up to 105W with Vega Series Graphics in Ryzen Series APU.It has Quick Installation Guide, Support CD, I/O Shield, 2 x SATA Data Cables, 1 x Screw for M.2 Socket.For graphical support ,It has DirectX 12, Pixel Shader 5.0, Three graphics output options: D-Sub, DVI-D and HDMI. That Motherboard can supports triple Monitor, HDMI with max. resolution up to 4K x 2K (4096x2160) @ 24Hz / (3840x2160) @ 30Hz, DVI-D with max. resolution up to 1920x1200 @ 60Hz, D-Sub with max. resolution up to 2048x1536 @ 60Hz, Auto Lip Sync, Deep Color (12bpc), xvYCC and HBR (High Bit Rate Audio) with HDMI Port (Compliant HDMI monitor is required), HDCP 1.4 with DVI-D and HDMI Ports and 4K Ultra HD (UHD) playback with HDMI Port.

In this amazing ASRock Motherboard the ASRock APP Charger, ASRock XFast LAN is used. Moreover, In this exclusive Motherboard used in different types of memory storage ; these are - Dual Channel DDR4 Memory Technology, 2 x DDR4 DIMM Slots, AMD Ryzen series CPUs (Pinnacle Ridge) support DDR4 3200+(OC) / 2933(OC) / 2667/2400/2133 ECC & non-ECC, un-buffered memory, AMD Ryzen series CPUs (Raven Ridge) support DDR4 3200+(OC) / 2933/2667/2400/2133 non-ECC, un-buffered memory, AMD 7th Gen A-Series APUs support DDR4 2400/2133 non-ECC, un-buffered memory, Max. capacity of system memory is 32GB, 15Î¼ Gold Contact in DIMM Slot. In this Motherboard, 128Mb AMI UEFI Legal BIOS with GUI support, Plug and Play", ACPI 5.1 compliance wake up events, jumperfree, SMBIOS 2.3 support, DRAM Voltage multi-adjustment are support. They have include PCIE x1 Gigabit LAN 10/100/1000 Mb/s, Realtek RTL8111H and Supports Wake-On-LAN, Lightning/ESD Protection, Energy Efficient Ethernet 802.3az and PXE in this exclusive grapics card. 

Special Features of this Motherboard That must be considered

Have a look on the special features of this board that might firm your buying decision.This Motherboard supports PCIe Gen3 x4 Ultra M.2 interface pushes data transfer speeds up to 32Gb/s. In addition, it also supports SATA3 6Gb/s M.2 modules, and is compatible with ASRockâ€™s U.2 Kit for installing some of the worldâ€™s fastest U.2 PCIe Gen3 x4 SSDs.PCB appearance represents rock-solid quality and gives the motherboard a more mysterious touch. In this Motherboard High Density Glass Fabric PCB design that reduces the gaps between the PCB layers to protect the Motherboard against electrical shorts caused by humidity and also the gaps between the PCB layers to protect the motherboard against electrical shorts caused by humidity.You can easily optimize your system and keep your motherboard up to date with ASRock Live Update & APP Shop.For gaming or entertainment these are the features one should consider of purchasing it.

ASRock Full Spike Protection includes various technologies to prevent motherboardâ€™s components from being damaged by these unexpected voltage spikes. full_description:
ASRock B550M Steel Legend AMD AM4 Micro-ATX Motherboard

The ASRock B550M Steel Legend Motherboard is a robust and versatile motherboard that caters to the needs of AMD AM4 Socket Ryzen processors, including the Ryzen 3000, 3000 G-Series, 4000 G-Series, 5000, and 5000 G-Series Desktop Processors, providing exceptional performance for gaming and productivity tasks. This motherboard ensures effective power delivery for improved stability and overclocking capabilities thanks to its 10 Power Phase Design and Dr. MOS technology. It supports DDR4 memory at rates of up to 4733+MHz (OC), allowing for quick data processing and multitasking. The motherboard offers 1 PCIe 4.0 x16 slot, 1 PCIe 3.0 x16 slot, and 1 PCIe 3.0 x1 slot, along with 1 M.2 Key E slot for WiFi connectivity. Multiple graphics output choices include HDMI and DisplayPort, making it compatible with a wide range of displays. AMD CrossFireX support allows for multi-GPU configurations. The ASRock B550M Steel Legend boasts impressive audio capabilities with its 7.1 CH HD Audio featuring the Realtek ALC1220/ALC1200 Audio Codec and Nahimic Audio, delivering immersive sound quality for gaming and media consumption. It provides 6 SATA3 ports, 1 Hyper M.2 (PCIe Gen4 x4), and 1 M.2 (PCIe Gen3 x2 & SATA3), ensuring fast and versatile storage options. Connectivity options include 2 USB 3.2 Gen2 ports at the rear (Type A+C) and 8 USB

full_description:
ASRock B650M PG Riptide AMD AM5 Micro ATX Motherboard

The ASRock B650M PG Riptide Motherboard supports AMD's Ryzen 8000 & 7000-series processors with up to 16 Zen 4 cores as well as dual-channel DDR5 memory, Maximum Memory Capacity of up to 128GB. It features a 12+2+1 Power Phase, Dr.MOS design that features the latest SPS (Smart Power Stage) technology. The ASRock B650M PG Riptide features Nahimic Audio. Whether you are using headphones, a headset, external or internal speakers, via USB, Wi-Fi, analog output, or even HDMI, Nahimic Audio offers you the most engaging listening experience, vibrant and rich with details. The Powerful algorithms to ensure the best noise-free conversation, giving a constant vocal level no matter the distance from your mic. The Nahimic audio engine dynamically clears the sound and removes interference noise and lowers the voice variation. The result is better comprehension and less fatigue. The ASRock B650M PG Riptide offers the ultimate gaming experience. The Sound Tracker is a visual indicator that points out the directions from which predominant sounds are coming. Each sound is properly positioned at 360° on the radar for full immersion during the game. The Lightning Gaming Ports are aimed at die-hard gamers and enthusiasts! Lightning Gaming Ports are sourced from two different controller interfaces that assist gamers in connecting the high-speed mice/keyboard with the lower jitter and latency. The ASRock B650M PG Riptide comes with built-in RGB illumination, it also features onboard RGB headers and an addressable RGB header that allow the motherboard to be connected to compatible LED devices such as strips, CPU fans, coolers, chassis, and so on. The Blazing M.2 accommodates the latest PCI Express 5.0 standard to perform twice the bandwidth compared to the previous generation, with a breathtaking 128GB/s transfer speed, it is ready to unleash the full potential of future ultrafast SSDs. The extra large aluminum alloy M.2 heatsink effectively improves heat dissipation to keep those high-speed M.2 SSDs as cool as possible, it is able to give better stability while maintaining top performance. The enhanced M.2 heatsink with an anti-drop screw design makes sure installation process more easily. This motherboard has a pair of onboard Type-A and Type-C USB 3.2 Gen2 ports built on the rear i/o for supporting next-generation USB 3.2 Gen2 devices and delivering up to 10 Gbps data transfer rates. The ASRock B650M PG Riptide comes with 3 years of warranty.

product_page_short_description: Supported CPU: Ryzen 8000/ 7000 Series Processors for Socket AM5
full_description:
ASRock B650M PG Riptide WiFi AMD AM5 Micro ATX Motherboard

The ASRock B650M PG Riptide WiFi Motherboard supports AMD's Ryzen 8000 & 7000-series processors with up to 16 Zen 4 cores as well as dual-channel DDR5 memory, Maximum Memory Capacity of up to 128GB. It features a 12+2+1 Power Phase, Dr.MOS design that features the latest SPS (Smart Power Stage) technology. The ASRock B650M PG Riptide WiFi features Nahimic Audio. Whether you are using headphones, a headset, external or internal speakers, via USB, Wi-Fi, analog output, or even HDMI, Nahimic Audio offers you the most engaging listening experience, vibrant and rich with details. The Powerful algorithms to ensure the best noise-free conversation, giving a constant vocal level no matter the distance from your mic. The Nahimic audio engine dynamically clears the sound and removes interference noise and lowers the voice variation. The result is better comprehension and less fatigue. The ASRock B650M PG Riptide WiFi offers the ultimate gaming experience. The Sound Tracker is a visual indicator that points out the directions from which predominant sounds are coming. Each sound is properly positioned at 360° on the radar for full immersion during the game. WiFi 6E technology has extended to the whole new 6GHz spectrum band, providing more WiFi capability and giving even better and faster internet traffic. In addition, to deliver higher speeds, the WiFi 6E also enhances the lower latency and supports service levels that are equivalent to 5G networks. The Lightning Gaming Ports are aimed at die-hard gamers and enthusiasts! Lightning Gaming Ports are sourced from two different controller interfaces that assist gamers in connecting the high-speed mice/keyboard with the lower jitter and latency. The ASRock B650M PG Riptide WiFi comes with built-in RGB illumination, it also features onboard RGB headers and an addressable RGB header that allow the motherboard to be connected to compatible LED devices such as strips, CPU fans, coolers, chassis, and so on. The Blazing M.2 accommodates the latest PCI Express 5.0 standard to perform twice the bandwidth compared to the previous generation, with a breathtaking 128GB/s transfer speed, it is ready to unleash the full potential of future ultrafast SSDs. The extra large aluminum alloy M.2 heatsink effectively improves heat dissipation to keep those high-speed M.2 SSDs as cool as possible, it is able to give better stability while maintaining top performance. The enhanced M.2 heatsink with an anti-drop screw design makes sure installation process more easily. This motherboard has a pair of onboard Type-A and Type-C USB 3.2 Gen2 ports built on the rear i/o for supporting next-generation USB 3.2 Gen2 devices and delivering up to 10 Gbps data transfer rates. The ASRock B650M PG Riptide WiFi comes with 3 years of warranty.

full_description:
ASRock B550M-ITX/ac AMD AM4 Mini-ITX Motherboard

The ASRock B550M-ITX/ac Motherboard supports AMD AM4 Socket Ryzen 3000, 3000 G-Series, 4000 G-Series, 5000, and 5000 G-Series Desktop Processors. It supports DDR4 4733+ (OC). It features sturdy components and completely smooth power delivery to the CPU. Plus, it offers unmatched overclocking capabilities and enhanced performance with the lowest temperature for advanced gamers as well. This motherboard features onboard RGB headers and an addressable RGB header that allow the motherboard to be connected to compatible LED devices such as strips, CPU fans, coolers, chassis, and so on. Users may also synchronize RGB LED devices across the Polychrome RGB Sync-certified accessories to create their own unique lighting effects. The ASRock B550M-ITX/ac Motherboard comes with an 802.11ac WiFi (2.4G / 5G WiFi) module which supports wireless networks and Bluetooth. It supports the next generation PCI Express 4.0 M.2 SSDs, it is capable of performing twice the speed compared to the previous 3rd generation, giving a lightning-fast data transferring experience. This motherboard has a pair of onboard Type-A and Type-C USB 3.2 Gen1 ports built on the rear i/o for supporting next-generation USB 3.2 Gen1 devices and delivering up to 5 Gbps data transfer rates. Complete with two types of most used connectors! Packed with an HDMI + DisplayPort combo, you have more graphics output options. The ASRock B550M-ITX/ac Motherboard comes with 3 years  of warranty.

full_description:
AMD StoreMI Technology

A powerful tool that combines the speed of your SSD with the capacity of your hard disk into a single, fast, easy-to-manage drive. SSDs are fast, but expensive, and offer minimal capacity. Mechanical hard drives boast large capacity for a low price, but are much slower than an SSD. AMD StoreMI technology â€œcombinesâ€� these two types of storage into a single drive and automatically moves the data you access the most to the SSD, so you get the best of both worlds: SSD responsiveness, and mechanical hard disk capacity. You can also use up to 2GB of RAM as a last-level cache for ultra-fast data.

Dual M.2 For SSD

Equipped with M.2 slot that supports both SATA3 6Gb/s and PCIe Gen3 x4 Ultra M.2 interface that pushes data transfer speeds up to 32Gb/s, and is compatible with ASRockâ€™s U.2 Kit for installing some of the worldâ€™s fastest U.2 PCIe Gen3 x4 SSD.

full_description:
ASRock B550 PG Riptide AMD AM4 ATX Motherboard (No Warranty)

The ASRock B550 PG Riptide AMD AM4 ATX Motherboard features sturdy components and completely smooth power delivery to the CPU. Plus, it provides unmatched overclocking capabilities and enhanced performance with the lowest temperature for advanced gamers as well. ASRock B550M supports Dual M.2(22110) For SSD. Besides the onboard LAN port, users may also choose 802.11ac wireless connections by M.2 (Key E) slot. The Sound Tracker is the visual indicator that points out the directions from which predominant sounds are coming. Each sound is properly positioned at 360Â° on a radar for a full immersion during the game. Whether the user is using headphones, a headset, external or internal speakers, via USB, Wi-Fi, analog output, or even HDMI, Nahimic Audio offers user the most engaging listening experience, vibrant and rich with details. This motherboard features onboard RGB headers and an addressable RGB header that permits the motherboard to be connected to compatible LED devices such as strip, CPU fans, coolers, chassis, and many more. An easy troubleshooting tool that shows the CPU / DRAM / VGA / BOOT operation every time you start up the system. Post Status Checker is a fast and easy way to identify the source of the problem. Extra-large aluminum alloy heat sinks that effectively take away heat from the MOSFET and chipset so that the user's whole system may perform more stable. Also, 2oz Copper PCB delivers lower temperature and higher energy efficiency for overclocking. High-Density Glass Fabric PCB design that diminishes the gaps between the PCB layers to protect the motherboard from electrical shorts caused by humidity. Packed with a D-Sub + DisplayPort + HDMI combo. Plus the HDMI port supports 4K resolution. Some sensitive digital components on the motherboard are vulnerable to power surges, the excessive current may cause the system to malfunction immediately. ASRock Full Spike Protection includes various technologies to prevent motherboard components from being damaged by these unexpected voltage spikes. ASRock Live Update & APP Shop is designed for user convenience. Provides various apps and support software for users to download. This exclusive ASRock B550 Phantom comes with No warranty.

full_description:
ASRock X570 Taichi Razer Edition AMD AM4 ATX Motherboard (No Warranty)

ASRock X570 Taichi Razer Edition is a high-performance motherboard built for AMD AM4 Socket Ryzen processors. It boasts a 16 Power Phase Design and supports DDR4 4666+ (OC) memory. With 3 PCIe 4.0 x16 slots and compatibility with AMD 3-Way CrossFireX and NVIDIA SLI, it delivers exceptional graphics performance. The motherboard is equipped with an HDMI port for graphics output and features 7.1 CH HD Audio with Nahimic Audio, providing an immersive sound experience. It offers abundant storage options with 8 SATA3 ports and 3 M.2 slots. Connectivity-wise, it includes USB 3.2 Gen2, Killer E3100G 2.5G LAN, and Killer AX1650x Wi-Fi 6, ensuring fast and reliable networking. Additionally, it supports Razer Chroma for customizable lighting effects. ASRock introduces the first motherboard with Intel Wi-Fi 6 802.11ax adapter, providing speeds up to 2.4Gbps and support for both 2.4GHz and 5GHz. The new PCI Express 4.0 offers double the speed of the previous generation. ASRock's Steel Slot ensures stable signals and secure installation of heavy graphics cards. The motherboard features customizable RGB lighting, synchronized with Polychrome RGB Sync-certified accessories. With an aluminum alloy heatsink and Hyper M.2 Socket, heat dissipation and transfer speeds are improved. The Phantom Gaming 2.5Gb/s LAN platform offers enhanced networking performance

ASRock X570 Taichi Razer Edition AMD AM4 ATX Motherboard comes with no warranty.
